mapper.select: SELECT mem_id, mem_name, DATE_FORMAT(mem_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') mem_date, CASE authority WHEN 'ROLE_USER' THEN '일반' END authority FROM tm_member WHERE mem_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) AND jointype = 1 AND enabled = 1 AND del_chk = 1 ORDER BY mem_date DESC
SELECT count(mem_id) count FROM tm_member WHERE mem_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) AND jointype = 1 AND enabled = 1 AND del_chk = 1

SELECT mem_id, CASE authority WHEN 'ROLE_COACH' THEN '감독' WHEN 'ROLE_CLUB' THEN '클럽' END authority, DATE_FORMAT(mem_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') mem_date FROM tm_member WHERE jointype IN (2,3) AND enabled = 3 AND del_chk = 1 ORDER BY mem_date DESC
SELECT count(mem_id) count FROM tm_member WHERE jointype IN (2,3) AND enabled = 3 AND del_chk = 1

SELECT mem_id, del_date, CASE authority WHEN 'ROLE_COACH' THEN '감독' WHEN 'ROLE_CLUB' THEN '클럽' WHEN 'ROLE_USER' THEN '일반' END authority FROM tm_member WHERE mem_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND del_chk = 0 ORDER BY del_date DESC
SELECT count(mem_id) count FROM tm_member WHERE mem_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND del_chk = 0
SELECT position1_name FROM tm_position GROUP BY position1_name ORDER BY position_no
SELECT position2_name FROM tm_position WHERE position1_name = #{position1}
SELECT continent_no, country_no, country_name FROM tm_country ORDER BY country_name ASC

SELECT c.club_no, c.club_name FROM tm_club c INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.country_no, b.league_no, a.country_name, b.league_name FROM tm_country a INNER JOIN tm_league b ON a.country_no = b.country_no WHERE b.league_no = #{country}) aa ON c.league_no = aa.league_no
SELECT formation_name FROM tm_formation

SELECT mem_id, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_email, DATE_FORMAT(mem_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') mem_date, jointype, enabled, CASE authority WHEN 'ROLE_COACH' THEN '감독' WHEN 'ROLE_CLUB' THEN '클럽' WHEN 'ROLE_USER' THEN '일반' END authority FROM tm_member WHERE enabled = 1 AND del_chk = 1 ORDER BY mem_date DESC

SELECT champs_group FROM tm_champs GROUP BY champs_group

SELECT a2.club_no, a2.champs_group, CAST(a2.rank AS INT) rank, b.club_name FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.champs_group, (CASE @group_code WHEN a.champs_group THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rank, (@group_code:=a.champs_group) group_code FROM tm_champs a, (SELECT @group_code:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) a1 ORDER BY a.champs_group) a2 LEFT JOIN tm_club b ON a2.club_no = b.club_no

SELECT a2.club_no, a2.champs_group, CAST(a2.rank AS INT) rank, b.club_name FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.champs_group, (CASE @group_code WHEN a.champs_group THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rank, (@group_code:=a.champs_group) group_code FROM tm_champs a, (SELECT @group_code:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) a1 WHERE a.champs_group = #{group} ORDER BY a.champs_group) a2 LEFT JOIN tm_club b ON a2.club_no = b.club_no

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(player_no) FROM tm_player
SELECT COUNT(player_no) FROM tm_player WHERE player_name LIKE '%${text}%'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, CAST(@rownum:=@rownum+1 AS INT) rank FROM tm_player a, (SELECT @rownum:=0) b WHERE player_name LIKE '%${text}%') a1 LIMIT ${spage}, 22

SELECT a.coach_no, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.coach_name, a.coach_birth, a.coach_age, a.coach_formation, DATE_FORMAT(a.coach_date, '%Y-%m-%d') coach_date FROM tm_coach a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no WHERE a.coach_no = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(coach_no) FROM tm_coach
SELECT count(a.coach_no) FROM tm_coach a LEFT JOIN tm_club b ON a.coach_no = b.coach_no WHERE a.coach_name LIKE '%${text}%'

SELECT a1.coach_no, a1.country_no, a1.coach_name, a1.coach_birth, a1.coach_age, a1.coach_formation, DATE_FORMAT(a1.coach_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') coach_date, CAST(a1.rank AS INT) rank, c.club_no FROM (SELECT a.coach_no, a.country_no, a.coach_name, a.coach_birth, a.coach_age, a.coach_formation, a.coach_date, @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rank FROM tm_coach a, (SELECT @rownum:=0) b WHERE a.coach_name LIKE '%${text}%') a1 LEFT JOIN tm_club c ON a1.coach_no = c.coach_no ORDER BY a1.coach_no ASC LIMIT ${spage}, 22
